original_title: La paisana Jacinta: En búsqueda de Wasaberto
overview: Its the story of a naive Peruvian native who goes to Lima, Peru, in order to gain fortune, on her way back to her hometown, she discovers that her ,(almost, as she said it) husband has gone to Lima in order to solve a problem with a building company that threatens to demolish her town and build an enormous hotel on top.
title: La paisana Jacinta: En búsqueda de Wasaberto
